column5: Our place is close to dining in Addison (on Belt Line Rd.), shopping at the Galleria, and a great Mexican restaurant called Casa Navarro! We are about 30 minutes from anything you could want to do in Dallas. Youâ€™ll love our place because of the guest room, shared common spaces, and big back yard. Our place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
column8: Club Coral - Home in North Dallas
